website_summaries.verdict: This powered jack stands out for its strong lift capacity and high-end features.
pros: Easy level deployment through its single-axis level
Has 3 LED lights for night or low-light use
cons: Reports that this option arrives damaged
Some buyers felt that this jack operated very slowly

customer_reviews.title: slow and low on power
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my Airstream with 900lbs tongue weight and it could barley handle it. No way it could take the suspension weight of my tow vehicle for installation of the weight distribution bars. My original Barker Manufacturing 3500Lbs capacity had greater speed and capacity, thought the 4000Lbs rating would be an improvement, not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for RV
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of the box removed the old manual crank down jack dropped the Bulldog in and bolted it down with supplied bolts. The bolts matched the thread that was already in the frame. The wiring is a one wire hook up that goes to the positive battery post all I needed was a terminal for the end of the wire worked first time. Spring loaded drop pin was easy to install works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! So much better than cranking by hand. I have it on a 28ft travel trailer with a dry weight of 6300 lbs. no problems at all. It will actually lift the tires off the ground if you jack it up that high. The work light puts off a good amount of light. Installation was pretty easy. Took about 30 minutes. I had just enough amount of wire to reach my battery so it worked out great. Before you hook it up though, go to auto zone and get a copper battery terminal, it's not supplied with the kit. Other than that, very easy install. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: Great jack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my manual tongue jack, WOW makes hooking and unhooking loads easier! The quick lock leg extender is a nice feature. The little level makes for quick level reference A little slow but does the job and does it effortlessly, lifts the tongue of my 28' puma and3/4 ton silverado, no problem! Super easy install, so far I love this jack, I would recommend to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: Russell Mott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great power, led lights and a level.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this jack on my 26 foot toy hauler. It had a manual jack that was a real pain to operate. This Bulldog jack raises my trailer with ease. The lights are bright and level is a real plus. I have had other trailers with the cheap factory electric jacks that strained to lift lighter trailers. Do yourself a favor and get one of these jacks. Very easy to install, one wire and three bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Lafayette Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Jack
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Easy to install, easy to wire. No more cranking the camper up and down. A friend who was on one of our camping trips saw it and bought one for his camper too. Some reviewers complained of it operating slowly. I'm not sure how theirs worked, but this is far faster than cranking ever was. I purchased the 4000 lb capacity jack for a 26' camper with a tongue weight of around 700 lbs so it might be a little overkill, but it works great and takes most of the work out of setting up and tearing down the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Box which was Christmas gift, received ripped up badly & taped up, but works.
customer_reviews.text: Received 15 minutes ago with packaging ripped up badly and taped up. Not nice when this is a Christmas gift. Don’t know yet if inside items are broken since it has a light and mechanical parts. Concerns me. Waiting until my husband comes home to check out his NOW early Christmas present to check out more. Can’t review it yet and the fault may lie with Amazon. Which is why I have 4 stars at the moment. Who knows where this happened. The amazon box it came it looked undisturbed so I don’t think it was the carrier. I wanted this on record so posting review now. UpDate: we installed yesterday, seems to work fine so far
customer_reviews.author: perryville

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, very quiet, easy install, but short wiring
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why some of the reviews are complaining about how slow it is, I put this on my toy hauler and fully loaded it’s right at 11,000 lbs. Took all of about 30-45 seconds to lift it off my chevy 2500 HD hitch. Super quiet. Very easy to install. Only one negative is like other reviews is that the wire from the unit is about 2 feet short to wire to my batteries, but easy enough to splice in an extension so it reaches
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Griess

customer_reviews.title: Blows fuses at upper limit.  No warning.
customer_reviews.text: When you reach the upper, extended limit, there is no warning. It simply blows the 30 amp fuse. The manufacturer says this is the way it works. Not good. You can buy a cheaper one for less money that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Faltus

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet power jack
customer_reviews.text: This power jack is very very quiet, the one that came on my camper was terribly noisy so This one will be a pleasant change. My only concern is the jack head rocks back and forth when raising and lowering, not sure if that is normal or not?
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: works great, installation was easy even with two grand daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: works great, installation was easy even with two grand daughters helping. The only issue, and I was aware of it from the other reviews, is the power wire is to short, another foot and it would have been perfect. Tested it after installation works perfect, much better than cranking by hand, wish I would have done this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Buford A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, works well. Does not come with cover, bought separate one. bright LEDs. Can’t wait for camping trip
customer_reviews.author: charlie keyes

customer_reviews.title: Bulldog Powered Drive A-Frame Tongue Jack
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a manual unit that came on my Jayco 30' RV. Works great. Love the spring pull pin for the foot. Easy to store and go. It's been almost 2 yeas and so far so good. Only real issue is the power supply line could have been a couple feet longer at least. Had to splice in an extension to make it to the fuse box at the front of the camper shell.
customer_reviews.author: L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Installed quickly and easily. The only thing needed was a wiring end to attach the positive wire to the battery. I also protected the connections with dielectric grease. Works great, and looks much better than the manual jack. Installed on a 2018 Jayco Jayflight SLX 264BH.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Installation and operation were a snap. My tongue weight is listed at 900 pounds, while you can hear the motor torque, it lifts the tongue with ease. Liked the spring pin but had to take it off as it rubbed my battery operated dolly tires.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference.
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid we would go RVing a lot and I remember helping hitch and unhitch A LOT. Electric hitches are the way to go. It makes it so much easier especially if you are using some sort of weight distribution hitch. Just took it on a two week trip where we moved almost every day and this jack made it a much more enjoyable experience. The trailer it is on is 32' and weighs about 10000 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Quieter than expected. Raises and lowers athe a reasonable rates. Installed on 33 ft travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The jack looks nice but once you use it the quality issues show up. The gears are out of round and with every revolution the whole trailer moves back and forth from the gears binding. I feel this problem is going to be an issue with it lasting as long as it should.
customer_reviews.author: C A Cardino

customer_reviews.text: This is what I got. Waited almost a month for this
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: it is a very nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: put this on my enclosed 12ft all aluminum V nose trailor and it works good but lifts the trailor very slow almost like its to much for it.. we'll see in time if it was or not
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Even with a bad back I was able to install the Bulldog with ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze! Even with a bad back I was able to install the Bulldog with no problems at all. Have not taken RV out since installation, but using it to attach and detach from my truck, it seems smooth with plenty of power to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished installing this and am already in love with it! It was super easy to install. The bolt pattern matched perfectly with the holes on our old crank jack. It is really quiet and having the adjustable foot I won't have to raise it all the way up everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Becker

customer_reviews.title: What’s most important is if someone reads and works on the issue.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the Arrival of the package. Looks like they did several failed ISTA drop tests on this. Inner-packing is horrible for something this heavy. However, I have not connected the jack so let’s see how that goes. If it works fine, I’m good. If not, I’m looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: George Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far but would like to see a shut ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far but would like to see a shut off switch or better yet a keyed switch to shut it off so the on board battery doesn't get run down if someone is playing with it or some being able to lift it to try and steal the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, very nice...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an older jack. It installed very quickly and easily. I like that this jack will extend and retract much faster than the old one. It also runs quieter and stronger/smoother. So far, a very nice jack.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Easy, time saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I can't believe I thought about not buying it. You will never want to use the hand crank again. Its quality made. This thing is a time saver. It makes things so much easier. The only small thing I didn't like, is the little leveler thing that's inbedded in it, dried up.
customer_reviews.author: jaqrub

customer_reviews.title: Much better than manual lift
customer_reviews.text: Just added this to my camp trailer took maybe 15 minutes works perfectly if it lasts an acceptable amount of time I will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: WILPOWR

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had done my research for an electric jack and this was the one I chose as it is highly rated by RV professionals and others. It took about an hour to install and functioned as it should. I would say that if you intend to get one, you should consider a weather cover for the controls as they are exposed and could shorten the life of the jack as rain, snow and sun hit it.
customer_reviews.author: David L Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: No more endless spinning..
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have it in my taco trailer. Only down side had issues with the grown. It doesn't have a ground wireing cable because it uses the ground off the base.
customer_reviews.author: Wrx bob

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell!
customer_reviews.text: The Bulldog jack looks and works great so far. Installed it yesterday so really haven't used it. Installation & wiring were easy even for a 74 yr old man like me! Replaced an Atwood Premire 3000 which couldn't do the job after 2 1/2 years. Time will tell as to how good it is.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Very clean design. LED lights are very bright and useful. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Simple install.
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my 34 ft travel trailer GVRW 8000lbs toung wieght 750lbs. Installation was a snap. Had to turn sideways to clear propane tanks. have not used it to install weight distribution bars yet that will be the test. Slower than expected but still better than cranking by hand. Only thing I would change would add auto shutoff so power is not left on an drain battery.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because our old one could not handle our trailer load and gave out. This is perfect for our new one. Handles the load perfectly. Does not blow any fuses. Easy to hook up to our truck hitch too.
customer_reviews.author: T.Silva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install/easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: Not too noisy, easy to use, I like the spring latch quick drop shoe a lot. Overall, very handy... Bob Sterling San Leandro, CA.
customer_reviews.author: likesilver

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable delivery....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a beat up, damaged box. There was no surrounding Amazon box for protection, only the manufacturer's product box. The tear shown in the pictures is where the motorized head of the jack is. Before going thru installation, I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Val R.

customer_reviews.title: Popped level bubble.
customer_reviews.text: Great lift but the level bubble popped, an outside product should handle the weather??? Looks like the sun was too hot... Very poor customer service, on hold with no answer, even submitted an online request with no response. Still have no idea if I can get a replacement level.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love having This installed on my food trailer, no more cranking a jack in the hot Louisiana summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Deshawn

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: There is not a stop before it either retracts all the way or extends all the way and only stops when it blows the fuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Barreras

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Arms
customer_reviews.text: Bolted right up with no issues. wiring was very straight forward. Had this installed in 20 minutes and doing it's job. Much better than the hand crank!
customer_reviews.author: Heavyleaded

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and was easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and was easy to hook up. It comes with bolts if you need them. The level should help at the campground when I park the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Texas☆Caver

customer_reviews.title: my  rv
customer_reviews.text: The best think i bought for the rv love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: intall was easy enough. Seems very burly and well made
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, intall was easy enough. Seems very burly and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Markland

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Level the camper in a fraction of the time with one finger!
customer_reviews.author: Jamesbr80

customer_reviews.title: much better than the one I had before
customer_reviews.text: works flawlessly, much better than the one I had before. My trailer weighs a little over 5000 pounds and has 800 pounds tongue weight. Very happy .
customer_reviews.author: manuel hernandez jr

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Works a little slow
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Works a little slow, but much better than hand cranking for sure!!!! Hubby put it on in a flash after watching the video for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A.

customer_reviews.title: Removed old crank setup, Placed this in with all ...
customer_reviews.text: Removed old crank setup, Placed this in with all provided nut n bolts and had it up and running in less than 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Holton

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Mounted and wired in a matter of minutes. Note wiring is bare on the end and make sure you don’t accidentally hit the led light switch during the day (because you won’t notice them on)
customer_reviews.author: BrianL

customer_reviews.title: I tear them up before they break
customer_reviews.text: not their fault, but i break them once a year before they fail.
customer_reviews.author: THomas Edds

customer_reviews.title: I love this it has made my life so much easyer
customer_reviews.text: I love this it has made my life so much easyer. super easy to put in and that's it it is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: It amazing you can’t buy a trailer jack that works. I looked at all the reviews they all suck this one was no exception. Box was badly damaged. Made in USA ???
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wellwod

customer_reviews.title: Super Trailer Tongue Jack
customer_reviews.text: High quality, very powerful trailer tongue jack. Should have bought it years ago. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Stripsky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever for our travel trailer. Makes set up and tear down so much easier. Was easy to install, took 15 mins. So much faster than manual crank.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery. Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery. Easy installation. Wire to battery was 22" too short.
customer_reviews.author: ModelALover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my trailer
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect I have 28’ travel trailer lifts it fast and easy it’s pretty quiet as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Was very slow going up..Although a nice feature, safety chains get stuck on the spring pin..bending it constantly. Otherwise, it operates as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Houston

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased. Love how easy it was to install and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Pleased. Love how easy it was to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: DWRJWegs

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great jack.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bulldog jack. It works great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe H.

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, Great product. 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this jack. It operates a lot smoother than my original one.
customer_reviews.author: DEWAYNE E. McCARDELL

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as described. Took about 30-40 min. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. Took about 30-40 min. to install. Worked with no issues and the lights are a plus when unhooking from the truck in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Les Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Slow raising
customer_reviews.text: Jack very slow raising tongue, time will tell, at least 5 yr warranty
customer_reviews.author: brad b.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to mount it sideways so tailgate will open all the way, does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W. Peritore

customer_reviews.title: Install is east and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. Loved the built in level.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: High Five
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! will never have a hand crank again, works great the level on it works, showed up packaged well and easily installed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My unit did the same thing they need to do a lot better job with this
customer_reviews.text: Read a review on line that said the wires in the head unit was wrapped around the turning motor and when you try to lift the jack it cut the wires from the moving part.My unit did the same thing they need to do a lot better job with this,Ishould not have to repair the wires on a new unit before i even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana melvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product... Had to do a little grinding, but worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: DerDog

customer_reviews.title: Reliability of product
customer_reviews.text: 34 foot tag along camper working well very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Big dog

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved this. It made his life a lot easier ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this. It made his life a lot easier in hooking up the rv.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eure

customer_reviews.title: Electric Trailer Jack
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy to install... Just follow the directions !
customer_reviews.author: Rick Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Shipped fast, bolted right on works great. I would recommend this to others. Plus my favorite part no more cranking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great power jack for my travel trailer. Good quality and preformance. Installation was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil W.

customer_reviews.title: Great electric jack
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and constructed electric jack. Installation was easy. I had to install it facing to the side because of clearance issues with my propane cover. This was one of the main reasons I bought this jack...the ability to mount it either facing forward or to the side. Most A-Frame jacks don't have this option.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a cool looking jack and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to my little mishap and broke my stock electric jack. It is a cool looking jack and works great! Lights are much better than my last one and the quick release pin makes it really nice also. Mine came with a broken level on the top. I contact amazon and they sent me out a new jack so I could replace the level. No hassle good jack I recommend this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: thebrick001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works as expected. Should have came with a longer power supply line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Works great and looks good on my camper. The LEDs are an added bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice high quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality unit. I am very happy with this unit. The power line could stand to be a foot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saved a lot of wear and tear on my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Short

customer_reviews.title: Came as expected and was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected and was easy to install. So glad no more cranking. Product was not damaged and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well satisfied with operation of this unit. Hope it has a good life!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice, works nice
customer_reviews.text: Cranked the tongue for years---would never do it again. Fits nice, works nice, saves sweat! Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Strong!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trailer jack. It's very sturdy and does a great job raising and lowering our enclosed car trailer. Would highly recommend this jack!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: package had been opened and jack inserted upside down, level bubbler barley attached.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product.
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged and product is damaged. The level on the top of the jack is crushed/broken due to the damaged box. Product was shipped in the manufactures box with no extra packaging. We needed this product ASAP so will be attempting to install as is but would like to have the level replaced. If the jack does not work upon installment, we will be returning the entire product.
customer_reviews.author: MelA

product_meta.title: Bulldog 500199 Powered Drive A-Frame Tongue Jack with Spring Loaded Pull Pin - 4000 lb. Capacity (Black Cover)
product_meta.description: Bulldog Powered Drive A-Frame Tongue Jack, featuring Exclusive Spring-Loaded Drop Leg Pin. Rating of 4,000 lbs., 22" of total travel - 14" screw travel and 8" drop leg travel. Extended length of 34.50", and 24" clearance. Deploys and hooks up easily at night with 3 onboard LED courtesy lights to fully illuminate coupler area. Works in case of power loss with emergency manual override capability, easily accessible from the top. Lasts for years with industry-leading BULLDOG performance, known worldwide for unmatched strength, durability, and side load capacity. Retains like-new appearance with corrosion-resistant surfaces. Color coordinating white case cover. Also available with black case cover see Bulldog #500200. Limited 5-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Powered A-Frame Jack with heavy duty 4000 lbs. lift capacity
Exclusive Spring Loaded Drop Leg Pull Pin provides 22" of total travel -14" travel plus 8" drop leg makes access easy, even when a weight distribution system is present
Single-Axis Level makes level deployment easy
Emergency Manual Override allows operation when battery is drained
3 LED Courtesy Lights make hooking up and disconnecting at night easy Illuminates coupler area

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars172 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
